content.question: How many vertical asymptotes does the graph of <math alttext="y equals, the fraction with numerator x minus 2, and denominator x to the fourth power, minus 16, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>16</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> have?
